name: Audio Drive 2 VR
description:
Audio Drive 2 VR is a remake of "Audio Drive Neon", bringing the best parts of it's experimental versions into one package. An arcade racing game in a form of a music visualizer where the intensity of a song controls the maximum speed of your car.

Features:
  • Fun arcade car physics
  • Music visualizations
  • Procedural tracks
  • 11 different cars to unlock and drive
  • Local audio files/YouTube support for playing music (Note: YouTube support may be inconsistent at times, mostly because of their API changes)
  • Steering wheel support (force feedback, manual gearbox, tested on G27)
